name: PHAuthorizationStatus
desc: Information about your app’s authorization to access the user’s photo library.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user hasn’t set the app’s authorization status.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The app isn’t authorized to access the photo library, and the user can’t grant such permission.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user explicitly denied this app access to the photo library.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The user explicitly granted this app access to the photo library.

items.name: case limited
items.desc: The user authorized this app for limited photo library access.
